ACCESS_PUBLIC_TAG_TOOLTIP: This item is public. Anyone can access this item.

CREATE_NEW_ITEM_ETHERPAD_INFORMATIONS: Etherpad is a collaborative real-time text editor

CREATE_SHORTCUT_MODAL_TITLE_zero: Where do you want to create the shortcut for {{name}}?
CROP_IMAGE_MODAL_CONTENT_TEXT: Crop your chosen image to fit the image size requirements.
CROP_IMAGE_MODAL_UNEXPECTED_ERROR: An unexpected error happened, please try again later. You can dismiss this modal, refresh the page and try again. If this issue persists please contact us.
DELETE_ITEM_MODAL_CONTENT_one: This item will be deleted permanently.
DELETE_ITEM_MODAL_CONTENT_other: These items will be deleted permanently.
DROPZONE_HELPER_TEXT: Drop your files here to upload
HIDE_ITEM_HIDDEN_PARENT_INFORMATION: This item is hidden because its parent item is hidden.
HIDE_ITEM_SETTING_DESCRIPTION: If enabled, prevent readers from accessing this item and its content.
IMPORT_H5P_INFORMATIONS: You can upload H5P rich content by uploading exported .h5p files (e.g. from H5P.com, external Moodle services, etc).
IMPORT_H5P_LIMITATIONS_TEXT: You can upload up to one H5P of {{maxSize}} at a time.
IMPORT_H5P_WARNING: Once your file is accepted, it will take several minutes for all imported files to be available.
IMPORT_ZIP_INFORMATION: You can download your resources from graasp.eu by right clicking and choosing "Download as ZIP".
IMPORT_ZIP_LIMITATIONS_TEXT: You can upload up to one ZIP of {{maxSize}} at a time. On error, try to upload a smaller zip.
IMPORT_ZIP_WARNING: Once your file is accepted, it will take several minutes for it to be available.
INVITATIONS_TABLE_CANNOT_DELETE_PARENT_T: This invitation is defined in the parent item and cannot be deleted here.
ITEM_CATEGORIES_CONTAINER_MISSING_WARNIN: Add at least one category to better define the global theme of your content
ITEM_LANGUAGES_CONTAINER_MISSING_WARNING: Add at least one language in which your publication is written
ITEM_LICENSE_CONTAINER_MISSING_WARNING: Define the license to explain how other users can use your publication
ITEM_MEMBERSHIPS_TABLE_CANNOT_DELETE_PAR: This membership is defined in the parent item and cannot be deleted here.
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_ATTRIBUTION_TITLE: Do you want attribution for your work?
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_REQUIRE_ATTRIBUTION_OPT: Yes. Anyone using my work must include proper attribution.
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_CC0_OPTION_LABEL: No. Anyone can use my work, even without giving me attribution.
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_COMMERCIAL_TITLE: Do you want to allow others to use your work commercially?
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_ALLOW_COMMERCIAL_OPTION: Yes. Others can use my work, even for commercial purposes.
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_DISALLOW_COMMERCIAL_OPT: No. Others can not use my work for commercial purposes.
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_REMIX_TITLE: Do you want to allow others to remix, adapt, or build upon your work?
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_ALLOW_REMIX_OPTION_LABE: Yes. Others can remix, adapt, or build upon my work.
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_ALLOW_SHARE_ALIKE_REMIX: Yes, as long as others share alike in a compatible license.
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_DISALLOW_REMIX_OPTION_L: No. Others may only use my work in unadapted form.
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_LICENSE_INFORMATIONS:
All content published on Graasp Library does not allow commercial use.
 Allow adaptations of your work to be shared?
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_LICENSE_MODAL_CONTENT: Please verify that your item fits the CC License, and do not change to a more restricted option.
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_LICENSE_MORE_INFORMATIO: Need more info about CC License? Click here!
ITEM_SETTINGS_VISIBILITY_CANNOT_EDIT_PAR: You cannot modify the visibility because it is defined in one of the parent of this item.
ITEM_SETTINGS_VISIBILITY_PRIVATE_INFORMA: This item is private. Only authorized members can access it.
ITEM_SETTINGS_VISIBILITY_PSEUDONYMIZED_S: This item is accessible if the visitor provides a
ITEM_SETTINGS_VISIBILITY_PUBLIC_INFORMAT:
This item is public. Anyone can access it.
 Note: Items will be unpublished automatically if you change the visibility state from public to others.
ITEM_SETTINGS_VISIBILITY_HIDDEN_INFORMAT: This item is hidden. Only admins and writers can access this item.
ITEM_TAGS_PLACEHOLDER: Add tags like english, biology, lab, plants, high school
ITEM_TAGS_HELPER_TEXT: Use the 'Enter' key to add a new tag
ITEM_TAGS_MISSING_WARNING: Add at least one tag to better explain who could use your publication
ITEMS_TABLE_EMPTY_MESSAGE: This folder does not contain any items
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_INFORMATION: Collaboration lies at the heart of Graasp. Our shared library fosters a vibrant community of educators and professionals. Easily share and access content, co-create materials, and connect with fellow educators, amplifying knowledge sharing and collective learning experiences.
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_PUBLISH_NOTIFICATIONS_L: Send email notifications to all co-editors
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_PUBLISHED_STATUS: This element is published. Anyone can access it and is available on Graasp Library, our public repository of learning ressources.
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_CHILD_PUBLISHED_STATUS: This element is part of a collection that is already published. Publishing and un-publishing can be done at the collection root.
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_TYPE_NOT_ALLOWED_STATUS: This element cannot be published. Only a {{allowedItemTypes}} is allowed to be published on Graasp Library.
This element cannot be published. Only the {{allowedItemTypes}} are allowed to be published on Graasp Library.
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION: Below is what your publication will look like in Graasp Library.
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_VALIDATION_INFORMATIONS: You can publish your item in the Graasp Library. Please allow some time for the item's validation to finish.
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_VALIDATION_STATUS_FAILU: Your item might contain inappropriate content. Please remove them and validate your item again. If you have any question, please contact {{contact}}.
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_VALIDATION_STATUS_PENDI: Your item is pending automatic validation. Once the validation succeeds, you will be able to publish your item.
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_VALIDATION_STATUS_READY: The item is valid and ready to be published in Graasp Library.
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_VALIDATION_STATUS_OUTDA: The element was updated since the last verification. It must be validated again to be sure that it is still valid.
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_UNAUTHORIZED: You do not have the permission to publish this item.
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_MISSIN: Add a description to explain what your item is about
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_ITEM_NO_DESCRIPTION: This item doesn't have a description.
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_THUMBNAIL_MISSING_WARNI: Add a thumbnail to improve your publication's visibility
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_ITEM_NAME_CANNOT_BE_EMP: The item's name can't be empty
PUBLIC_VISIBILITY_MODAL_DESCRIPTION: The visibility of this item is not Public. To publish it in the Library, you must set its visibility to pubic. This action will allow any user to have access to your item. Do you want to continue?
UPDATE_VISIBILITY_MODAL_DESCRIPTION: This element is currently published in the Graasp library. If you change its visibility, the item will be unpublished and will no longer be available in the library. Would you like to continue?

MOVE_ITEM_MODAL_TITLE_other: Where do you want to move {{name}} and {{count}} others?

NEW_ITEM_BUTTON_HELPER_TEXT: Create content and add interactive elements
SETTINGS_LINK_SETTINGS_INFORMATIONS: If both setting are disabled, a button will be displayed by default.
SETTINGS_LINK_SHOW_IFRAME: Show Link Iframe (some websites prevent this feature)
SETTINGS_ALIGNMENT_HELPER: Defines if image should be centered, left or right aligned
SETTINGS_THUMBNAIL_SETTINGS_INFORMATIONS: Provide an image to update the thumbnail. You might need to refresh the page to see the changes.
SHARE_ITEM_CSV_IMPORT_ERROR_MESSAGE: The import failed for these entries
SHARE_ITEM_CSV_IMPORT_ERROR_MISSING_COLU: The required column '{{column}}' is missing in the provided file.
SHARE_ITEM_CSV_IMPORT_SELECTED_TEMPLATE_: This item will be used as the template for the creation of the user groups. All groups will have a copy of this item's content.
IMPORT_CSV_ERROR_TITLE: Operation returned errors, please try again after fixing the issues
SHARE_ITEM_CSV_SUMMARY_MODIFYING_EXISTIN: You are trying to import a user that already has a permission on this item. We currently do not support this. Please remove users that already have permissions on this item from your csv file and try again.
SHARE_ITEM_CSV_IMPORT_MODAL_CONTENT:
Your CSV should have at least the column 'email'. The columns 'name', 'permission' and 'group_name' are optional.
 A CSV entry cannot override the data already saved. If a user already has permission, update the value in the table manually. Once a CSV file is selected, please click on the confirm button to start the importation of users
SHARE_ITEM_CSV_IMPORT_MODAL_CONTENT_GROU: 'group_name' column has been detected. Importing the CSV will create group folders in the current directory and invite the corresponding users to them.
SHARE_ITEM_CSV_IMPORT_MODAL_TITLE: Import users from a CSV file
SHARE_ITEM_FORM_INVITATION_EMAIL_EXISTS_: This user already has access to this item
SHARE_ITEM_FORM_INVITATION_TOOLTIP: Non-registered users will receive a personal link to register on the platform.
SHARED_MEMBERS_TOOLTIP_one: This item is shared with one user
SHARED_MEMBERS_TOOLTIP_other: This item is shared with {{count}} users
SHARING_AUTHENTICATED_MEMBERS_EMPTY_MESS: No user has authenticated to this item yet.
SHARING_AUTHORIZED_MEMBERS_EMPTY_MESSAGE: You are the only user with access to this item.
SHARING_INVITATIONS_EMPTY_MESSAGE: No pending invitations for this item.

UPLOAD_FILE_LIMITATIONS_TEXT: You can upload up to {{maxFiles}} files of {{maxSize}} at a time.
FALLBACK_TEXT: Sorry, something went wrong. Try again later.
DELETE_OWN_MEMBERSHIP_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete your own permission on this item? You will loose access to this item, this action can not be undone.
DELETE_MEMBERSHIP_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to remove {{permissionLevel}} access on this item for {{name}}? They might loose access to this item.
DELETE_LAST_ADMIN_ALERT_MESSAGE: You are not allowed to delete this admin as this is the only admin

DOWNGRADE_PERMISSION_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to downgrade your own permission? Once it's done you can't undo.
CREATE_CUSTOM_APP_HELPER_TEXT: If you know the URL of an interactive app that can leverage Graasp's API you can input it here.
APP_LIST_LOADING_FAILED: There was an error getting the app list. Please try again later.
